fields.label: Inverse Relationship Type
fields.name: inverse_relationship_type
fields.instructions: Select the inverse relationship type. For example, if this is 'Parent', select 'Child'. If this is 'Spouse', select 'Spouse' (same type). Leave empty if this relationship type has no inverse.

fields.label: Is Gender Dependent
fields.name: is_gender_dependent
fields.message: This relationship type depends on the gender of the people involved
fields.instructions: Check if this relationship type depends on gender (e.g., aunt/uncle, niece/nephew). When creating inverses, the system will resolve to the correct gender-specific type.

fields.label: Gender Dependent Group
fields.name: gender_dependent_group
fields.instructions: Group name for gender variants (e.g., 'aunt_uncle', 'niece_nephew'). Types in the same group will be resolved based on gender when creating inverse relationships.
